reviewText: Cute stories. Kids love learning the vocabulary words
Grandson, with DS loves the entire Word Girl series!
I Just love wordgirl and yes I am 23 Years old But I still love the show ALOT!

Depsite it being a childern show I really enjoy Word Girl and I enjoyed the dvd. I deeply regret that the local PBS Station took it off the air but at lest I have this and other Word Girl dvds. It is a great show for kids and some adults will realy enjoy it. I bought several Word Girl dvds and was very happy with all of them. The show teaches vocabulary skills and has good values (Unlike most tv shows these days).
